授業目的: This course seeks to understand the history of postwar Japan on politics, diplomacy, economy, society, and culture. Based on these lecture, we will discuss a story of postwar Japanese history.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
Course Format:Combination of lectures and discussion.
This class conducted by interactive.
For this class, students are required to read reference books and download materials: PowerPoint slide.
Before the class, until July 20th, the teacher uploads the detail of this class.
In the class, this class conducts by a video broadcasting system.
If students cannot take the online class by video broadcasting system, the teacher submits tasks each session, students ask by e-mail.
By the circumstance of students, this class fix.

第1回:
Face to face for all sessions.
Please refer to section, overview for each class.
トピック.授業計画1:
Day1:Introduction and Lecture
ay1①:Overview of the postwar Japanese Political History
Day1②: From Allied Occupation, the Impact of the Korean War and Japan-U.S. relation, Economic Miracle. Revised Japan-US Security treaty.
Day1③:Resolving the legacy of the ASIA Pacific War: reversion of Okinawa and Restoring Relations with People's Republic of China

Day2: Simulation1 Japanese Restoring Relations with People’s Republic of China.
Day2①:Introduction of Simulation
Day2②:Lecture of Japanese Restoring Relations with People’s Republic of China.
Day2③:Discuss Action Plan

Day3:Simulation Review and Lectures
Day3①:Simulation Review
Day3②:The end of Cold War
Day3③:Two lost decade

Day4: Simulation Review and Simulation 2: U.S.-China Relation and Japan
Day4①:Simulation Review
Day4②:Lecture of U.S.-China Relation under Trump administration
Day4③:Discuss Action Plan

Day5: Review of the class
Day5①:Review of Simulation 2
Day5②:Review of Postwar Japanese Political History
トピック.授業外学習2: In preparation for this class, please study the basic knowledge of Japanese political history in reference books. Also, in preparation for writing the action paper, please do some research on the case specified in the case.

参考書/Reference books1: Makoto Iokibe., eds, translated and annotated by Robert D. Eldridge.,
The Diplomatic History of Post War Japan
参考書/Reference books2: A Modern History of Japan From Tokugawa Times to the Present (2nd ed.)
参考書/Reference books3: The Political History of Modern Japan (Japan Library)
